scripts.clean: rm -R dist/* && rm -R dev/* && mkdirp -p dist/media && mkdirp -p dev/media
scripts.build-prod: mkdirp -p dist/media && cp -r src/media/* dist/media && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build-dev: mkdirp -p dev/media && cp -r src/media/* dev/media && webpack --config webpack.dev.config.js --watch
